name: Geth's Verdict
originalText: Target player sacrifices a creature and loses 1 life.

rulings.text: As long as the player is a legal target when Geth’s Verdict resolves, that player loses 1 life even if they didn’t sacrifice a creature (most likely because they didn’t control any).
